title: Simulation-Based Learning for Transferring Medical Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical communication theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A Process Where Practicing Professionals Apply Communication Skills and Receive Feedback by Simulating Actual Clinical Scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective questioning techniques during patient role-play conversations in simulation environments with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze the appropriateness of skill application (JOS-type-c) through self-assessment after communication performance using at least three specific criteria
Learners can revise communication strategies based on peer feedback and instructor coaching to propose at least two alternative techniques for similar situations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
